info.title: Benefit Scheme Details
info.description:
# Usage Terms
These interfaces are business-critical interfaces for HMRC and DWP, supporting thousands of staff - all consumption, or change in consumption levels, should be registered and fully approved (see Registered Consumers below).

get.summary: Benefit Scheme Details for a given ASCN/SCON
get.description:
# Purpose
This API is used to maintain the details of a benefit scheme from NPS (National Insurance & PAYE Service). It forms part of the Contracted-Out Pension Processing.

## Version Log
| Version | Date | Author | Description |
|---------|------|--------|-------------|
| 0.0.1 | 10/12/2025 | NPS Development Team  | Initial Draft  |

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.
correlationId.name: correlationId

govUkOriginatorId.description: Identity of the Originating System that made the API call.
govUkOriginatorId.name: gov-uk-originator-id

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.
govUkOrganisationId.name: gov-uk-organisation-id

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.
govUkUserId.name: gov-uk-user-id

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.
govUkUserName.name: gov-uk-user-name

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.
govUkJobRole.name: gov-uk-job-role

Identifier.name: identifier
Identifier.description: The identifier of which could be either a Temporary Reference Number (TRN) or a National Insurance Number (NINO).

SchemeContractedOutNumberDetails.description: Scheme Contracted-Out Numbers of Personal Pension (ASCN) or Occupational Pension (SCON) with prefix and suffix.
SchemeContractedOutNumberDetails.name: scon

enum: SOUTH GEORGIA AND SOUTH SANDWICH ISLAND
ARRANGEMENT FOR INVESTMENT OF CONTRIBUTION IN AN INTEREST ACCOUNT

identifier.description: The identifier of which could be either a Temporary Reference Number (TRN) e.g. 00A00000 or a National Insurance Number (NINO) e.g. AA000001A.

schemeContractedOutNumberDetails.description: Scheme Contracted-Out Numbers of Personal Pension (ASCN) or Occupational Pension (SCON) with prefix and suffix.

correlationId.description: Correlation ID - used for traceability purposes - note that this value in the response matches that received in the request to allow correlation.

govUkOriginatorId.description: Identity of the Originating System that made the API call

govUkOrganisationId.description: A unique organisation ID for the user.

govUkUserId.description: A unique user ID for the user.

govUkUserName.description: A unique username for the user.

govUkJobRole.description: A unique job role for the user.

errorResponse_400.description: Array of Error Response Failure Object in Error Response.
errorResponse_400.title: Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

errorResponse_403.description: Error Response Payload for this API
errorResponse_403.title: Forbidden Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

code.description: The error code representing the Forbidden Error.

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

errorResponse_422.description: Error Response Payload for this API
errorResponse_422.title: Error Response

errorResponseFailure_422.description: Array of Error Response Failure Object in Error Response.
errorResponseFailure_422.title: Failure Object in Error Response

reason.description: Displays the reason of the failure.

code.description: The error code representing the error that has occurred.

GetBenefitSchemeDetailsResponse.description: Success response payload for this API.

RetrieveBenefitSchemeDetails.description: Contains details of a benefit scheme.

magneticTapeNumber.description: A unique number allocated to a pension scheme administrator, who receives data on magnetic media, or personal pension provider.

schemeName.description: The name of the scheme used for the institution details of a benefit scheme.

schemeStartDate.description: The date on which the benefit scheme started.

schemeCessationDate.description: The date that the benefit scheme ceased.

contractedOutDeductionExtinguishedDate.description: Denotes the date that the Guaranteed Minimum Pension (GMP) contracted-out deduction ceased to be.

paymentSuspensionDate.description: The date that the scheme payments were suspended.

recoveriesSuspendedDate.description: The date that the scheme recoveries were suspended.

paymentRestartDate.description: The date that the scheme payments were restarted.

recoveriesRestartedDate.description: The date that the scheme recoveries were restarted.

schemeNature.description: The nature of the benefits scheme - e.g. insurance policy.

benefitSchemeInstitution.description: Denotes the type of institution that is running the benefit scheme.

accruedGMPLiabilityServiceDate.description: The date that the accrued guaranteed minimum pension liability service was provided by pension scheme administrators.

rerouteToSchemeCessation.description: Denotes whether or not transactions in receipt of a scheme membership need to be re-routed to the scheme cessation section rather than the default destination.

statementInhibitor.description: Denotes whether or not the issuing of an automatic revised statement should be inhibited for this and/or future tax years.

certificateCancellationDate.description: The date that the benefit scheme certificate was cancelled.

suspendedDate.description: The date the benefit scheme is suspended for an individual.

isleOfManInterest.description: Denotes whether or not the Isle of Man has an interest in the notification of change for the individual's account.

schemeWindingUp.description: Denotes whether or not a benefit scheme is in the process of winding-up and will be discharging all of its liabilities.

revaluationRateSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the revaluation rate history (i.e. row) of the revaluation rate history details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

benefitSchemeStatus.description: Denotes the status for a benefit scheme.

dateFormallyCertified.description: The date on which the existing benefit scheme or a benefit scheme conversion was formally certified.

privatePensionSchemeSanctionDate.description: Denotes the date on which a private pension was sanctioned.

currentOptimisticLock.description: Denotes the version of the data being viewed/processed - if this value is different to what is held in the database, any update requests would be rejected to avoid the risk of overwriting valid data with out of date data. The consumer must first refresh their data before re-attempting to perform any subsequent update requests.

schemeConversionDate.description: Denotes the conversion date for the stakeholder pension scheme.

schemeInhibitionStatus.description: Denotes the inhibition status for the scheme.

reconciliationDate.description: The reconciliation date for the Scheme Contracted-Out Number (SCON).

schemeContractedOutNumberDetails.description: Scheme Contracted-Out Numbers of Personal Pension (ASCN) or Occupational Pension (SCON) with prefix and suffix.

schemeAddressType.description: The type of address associated with the benefit scheme.

schemeAddressSequenceNumber.description: Unique sequence number representing the position in the scheme correspondence address history (i.e. row) of the scheme correspondence address details entry for this individual - this would only be populated if the previous call did not transfer all of the data i.e. there are more rows marked to be collected still.

schemeAddressStartDate.description: The start date for the correspondence address for the benefit scheme.

schemeAddressEndDate.description: The end date for the correspondence address for the benefit scheme.

country.description: The country that the address resides in.

areaDiallingCode.description: The area dialling code - aka subscriber trunk dialling (STD) code for a phone number.

schemeTelephoneNumber.description: The contact telephone number for the scheme operator.

schemeContractedOutNumberDetails.description: Scheme Contracted-Out Numbers of Personal Pension (ASCN) or Occupational Pension (SCON) with prefix and suffix.

schemeAddressLine1.description: The first line of a scheme's address - typically the primary address information i.e. sub-building name and building name - e.g. Flat 1 Rose House, or building number and dependant throughfare - e.g. 22 Church Mews, or building number and throughfare - e.g. 22 Church Street.

schemeAddressLine2.description: The second line of a scheme's address - typically the secondary address information - i.e. dependant throughfare or throughfare.

schemeAddressLocality.description: The third line of a scheme's address - i.e. the locality where the address resides in.

schemeAddressPostalTown.description: The fourth line of a scheme's address - i.e. the postal town where the address resides in.

schemePostcode.description: The postal code for an address. Includes formats of: X9 9XX, X99 9XX, XX9 9XX, XX99 9XX, X9X 9XX, XX9X 9XX, BFPO 9999.
